remarks: The identity element of a group is a left identity.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Oct-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
grpoidval.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
grpoidval.2 $e |- U = ( GId ` G ) $.
grpolid $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( U G A ) = A ) $.
